scripts.test:final:batch: node test/final/main_genfinal_test.js -p src/publics/batch_publics.json -t tmp/test_final_batch_publics.js && mocha tmp/test_final_batch_publics.js
scripts.test:final:blob: node test/final/main_genfinal_test.js -p src/publics/blob_outer_publics.json -t tmp/test_final_blob_outer_publics.js && mocha tmp/test_final_blob_outer_publics.js
scripts.test:C12: npm run verifier_compile && npm run verifier_C12_setup && npm run verifier_C12_exec && npm run verifier_C12_buildstarkinfo && npm run verifier_C12_pil_verify
scripts.test:C18: npm run verifier_compile && npm run verifier_C18_setup && npm run verifier_C18_exec && npm run verifier_C18_buildstarkinfo && npm run verifier_C18_pil_verify
scripts.test:recursive1:circom: npm run compressor_verifier_gencircom && npm run recursive1_gencircom && npm run recursive1_compile
scripts.test:recursive2:circom: npm run recursive1_verifier_gencircom && npm run recursive2_gencircom && npm run recursive2_compile
scripts.verifier_C12_setup: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/circom2pil/main_compressor_setup.js -r test/circom2pil/verifier.r1cs -p tmp/test.c12.pil -c tmp/test.c12.const -e tmp/test.c12.exec --cols=12
scripts.verifier_C12_exec: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/circom2pil/main_compressor_exec.js -i test/circom2pil/verifier.proof.zkin.json -w test/circom2pil/verifier_js/verifier.wasm -p tmp/test.c12.pil -e tmp/test.c12.exec -m tmp/test.c12.commit
scripts.verifier_C12_buildstarkinfo: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil2-stark-js/src/main_genstarkinfo.js --debug -p tmp/test.c12.pil -i tmp/test.c12.starkinfo.json -e tmp/test.c12.expressionsinfo.json -v tmp/test.c12.verifierinfo.json --skipimpols
scripts.verifier_C12_pil_verify: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil2-stark-js/src/main_pilverifier.js -m tmp/test.c12.commit -i test/circom2pil/verifier.publics.json -p tmp/test.c12.pil -c tmp/test.c12.const -s tmp/test.c12.starkinfo.json -e tmp/test.c12.expressionsinfo.json
scripts.verifier_C18_setup: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/circom2pil/main_compressor_setup.js -r test/circom2pil/verifier.r1cs -p tmp/test.c18.pil -c tmp/test.c18.const -e tmp/test.c18.exec --cols=18
scripts.verifier_C18_exec: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/circom2pil/main_compressor_exec.js -i test/circom2pil/verifier.proof.zkin.json -w test/circom2pil/verifier_js/verifier.wasm -p tmp/test.c18.pil -e tmp/test.c18.exec -m tmp/test.c18.commit
scripts.verifier_C18_buildstarkinfo: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil2-stark-js/src/main_genstarkinfo.js --debug -p tmp/test.c18.pil -i tmp/test.c18.starkinfo.json -e tmp/test.c18.expressionsinfo.json -v tmp/test.c18.verifierinfo.json --skipimpols
scripts.verifier_C18_pil_verify: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node node_modules/pil2-stark-js/src/main_pilverifier.js -m tmp/test.c18.commit -i test/circom2pil/verifier.publics.json -p tmp/test.c18.pil -c tmp/test.c18.const -s tmp/test.c18.starkinfo.json -e tmp/test.c18.expressionsinfo.json
